TopicTitle: No Frontier - A Space Exploration Company

Articles.Content:
What's NO FRONTIER?

NO FRONTIER is a company dedicated to Space Exploration. Our mission is to establish Kerbal life on the Muna and Duna. We believe that space has to be accessible to everyone.

 

How will NO FRONTIER accomplish that?

We are developing our first rocket (NF1 - No Frontier One) which we'll use to send commercial cargo to Earth's orbit. That's how we'll fund our Deep Space Travel Vehicle development.

 

Is NO FRONTIER going to re-use their rockets?

We believe that full reusability is possible and one of our challenges is to re-use our rockets to avoid space trash and make things more affordable. At first, our recoveries will include parachutes and will touchdown in the ocean, to be captured and re-used for future missions. Then, we'll start to try and land our rockets on land - just a few meters where it was launched.

 

When we'll get to see NO FRONTIER in action?

Our first tests scheduled before the end of the year. Stay tuned for more information about the rockets development and test reports. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to tell us in the comments.
